channel.title: Professionalism on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Professionalism on Adam Israel

item.title: Small does not mean amateur
item.description: I sent a submission to a market whose name I will not reveal on July 15th. Acknowledgement was received on July 17th, which I’ve included below, modified only to anonymize the publisher. There are enough mistakes contained in this experience that I think it’s worth examining, both for writers, editors, and small press publishers. Thank you for your submission. I expect to begin story review for Name Withheld in late July/early August and you should hear from me no later than September 15th.
